title: Puppet animation
creator_credit: David Johnson, Eric Halliday, Mark Sanders, Nancy Wahlquist and AFTRS
brief_description: A sequel to “The Animation game” (T/Code 015386) that examines and demonstrates the many possibilities of puppet animation. Produced in a humorous and stylistically appealing manner. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
